description: Wondering how to cook pork belly? Audrey from VIC swears by her five-spice pork belly recipe. Succulent pork and crackling is the perfect Sunday lunch.
name: Crispy Five-Spice Pork Belly Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place pork belly, rind-side down, on a baking tray. Bake for 50 minutes. Increase oven temperature to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Turn pork rind-side up. Brush vinegar over rind and bake for a further 45 minutes or until skin is crisp and pork is cooked through. Rest for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with onion and serve with rocket leaves.
